A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It was beautiful to watch. That's it. It's not Star Wars. I did not recognize it. I wanted see my childhood hero Luke but instead they gave me a second rate version. Felt like Thor 3 with all the jokes. Silly plot\, FO chasing resistance ships for 2 hours\, that's the plot guys! So much for galaxy wide conflict. Not excited for the 9th.
